scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.dist:win: npm run build-react && electron-builder --win zip dir
scripts.build:exe: npm run build-react && npx electron-packager . DownAnime --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out=dist_final --overwrite --no-prune --ignore="/(client/(src|node_modules|public|package-lock\.json)|dist_final|dist_new|dist|\.git|\.gitignore|vite\.config\.js)"
